meaningMnemonic: If you could <radical>stop</radical> <radical>spoon</radical>ing water onto that <radical>tree</radical> we could use it for <kanji>brushwood</kanji>. But if you don't stop, then it will be too wet to burn at all! Stop already!
readingMnemonic: You finally set the <kanji>brushwood</kanji> on fire and suddenly a <reading>Shiba</reading> (しば) Inu jumps out of the flames. So that's why they named this wood after them or... or vice versa?
